effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate aWinning Streak! increasing the damage of your Eviscerate, Secret Technique, and Black Powder by 2% stacking up to 8 times. Eviscerate, Secret Technique, and Black Powder have a 15% chance to removeWinning Streak!

Set: While Shadow Dance is active, you cannot loseWinning Streak!, gain an additional stack ofWinning Streak! each time you would gain one, and deal an additional 2% Shadow Damage perWinning Streak! stack.

Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate aWinning Streak! increasing the damage of your Eviscerate, Secret Technique, and Black Powder by 2% stacking up to 8 times. Eviscerate, Secret Technique, and Black Powder have a 15% chance to removeWinning Streak!

Set: While Shadow Dance is active, you cannot loseWinning Streak!, gain an additional stack ofWinning Streak! each time you would gain one, and deal an additional 2% Shadow Damage perWinning Streak! stack.
(2) Set: Symbols of Death increases the damage of your next Secret Technique by 20%.
(4) Set: Secret Technique increases the damage of your other finishing moves by 16% for 7 sec.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Call in a ravenous ally and ride off into the sunset (or 15 yds, whichever is closest), inflicting 1.5 million Fire damage split between all enemies you ride through. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
Equip: Your attacks have a chance to harmonize with the shard, granting you 16,750 Agility for 15 sec.
Equip: Don the mantle of the Trashmaster.
Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 178,656 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

name: Personal Tabard
description: Visit Personal Tabard Designers in Stormwind, Orgrimmar, or Valdrakken to change your personal tabard design.
